traits.name: Celestial Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to necrotic damage and radiant damage.

traits.name: Healing Hands
traits.description: As an action, you can touch a creature and restore a number of hit points equal to your level. You can use this trait once per long rest.

traits.name: Light Bearer
traits.description: You know the Light cantrip. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for it.

traits.name: Necrotic Shroud
traits.description: Starting at 3rd level, you can use your action to unleash the darkness within yourself, causing creatures around you to be frightened and dealing extra necrotic damage.
